Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • Controller
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener
    Connects model (Board) and visualisation to perform MVC model Listen for the events from the View, agrigates it calls and send signal for modification into the model and view.
    Version:
    24 November, 2018
    Author:
    Dmytro Sytnik (VanArman), Ahmed Romih (decarbonite)

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static Board model 
      private static java.util.Stack<java.lang.Integer> redoCoordinate 
      private static java.util.Stack<Plant> redoStack 
      private static java.util.Stack<java.lang.Integer> undoCoordinate 
      private static java.util.Stack<Plant> undoStack 
      private View view 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Controller(View v)
      Default constructor that requires only View to be passed Model creates automatically with 10 zombies to spawn, zero score and 200 in-game money
      Controller(View v, Board m)
      Default constructor that requires both Model and View objects in order make linkage between them.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void actionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent e) 
      int gameEnded()
      Check if the condition for ending game is reached
      void generateBoard()
      Sends command to the View object to generate initial board
      private void redo()
      Place previously excavated plant if one exists
      private void undo()
      Revert previous player action (excavate plant)
      void updateBoard()
      Sends command to the Model and View in order to synchronize changes in model and view

      • generateBoard

        public void generateBoard()
        Sends command to the View object to generate initial board

      • updateBoard

        public void updateBoard()
        Sends command to the Model and View in order to synchronize changes in model and view

      • gameEnded

        public int gameEnded()
        Check if the condition for ending game is reached
        Returns:
        1 if player won current level; 0 - zombies won

      • undo

        Revert previous player action (excavate plant)
